p: O. integrifolia exhibited highest effect against L. donovani (IC 50=17.24±0.87 µg/mL) as compared to other extracts. In addition, the extract displayed activity against L. aethiopica (IC 50=13.03±1.29 µg/mL) ( Table 1). Mothana et al reported growth inhibition of hydroalcoholic extract of O. fruticosa against L. infantum (IC 50 >64.0 µg/mL). 24
